title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1904.7 - Reserve requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1904.7 - Reserve requirements

State Regulations

The corporation may require that the following reserves
be created by the project recipient: (a) working capital fund; (b) replacement reserve; and
(c) operation reserve. To the extent permitted by the act and these
regulations, the working capital fund and the replacement reserve may be funded
by the payment, grant or loan of the corporation. The conditions and
requirements of said reserves shall be set forth in the regulatory
agreement. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1904.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
